titles.title: Aiding Social Services in States Temporarily Act of 2008
To increase funding for the program of block grants to States for social services.
Aiding Social Services in States Temporarily Act of 2008

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Income Security and Family Support.

bill.summary: Aiding Social Services in States Temporarily Act of 2008 - Amends title XX (Block Grants to States for Social Services) of the Social Security Act to increase FY2008 funding for the social services block grant program.
